title: Follow live: 12-seed Colorado State challenging 4-seed Maryland for spot in Sweet 16
Jokic expected back during Nuggets' homestand
description: Nikola Jokic, who has been sidelined due to left ankle impingement, plans to return "at some point" during the Nuggets' upcoming five-game homestand, coach Michael Malone said Sunday.
author: Tim MacMahon

title: Was 'embarrassing night' just a 'bump in road' for Scotland?
description: Midfielder John McGinn says Scotland let themselves down on "an embarrassing night", while head coach Steve Clarke wants a strong response to the "bump in the road" of the Nations League play-off defeat to Greece.

title: Ball boy heroics, penalties & comeback chaos on epic Nations League night
description: Ball boy heroics, penalties and comeback chaos - the second legs of the Nations League quarter-finals delivered plenty of drama and entertainment on a thrilling night.

title: Hamilton and Leclerc disqualified from Chinese GP
description: Ferrari drivers Lewis Hamilton and Charles Leclerc have been disqualified from the Chinese Grand Prix after their respective cars failed post-race technical checks.

title: Ferrari thrown out: What went wrong and what are the consequences?
description: Following Charles Leclerc and Lewis Hamilton's disqualifications at the Chinese Grand Prix, Sky Sports F1's Bernie Collins takes a closer look at what happened and the consequences going forward.

title: Heat snap 10-game losing streak with win against Hornets behind 42 from Wiggins
description: This was a season-high for Wiggins, who hit six 3-pointers.

title: Ole Miss women hold off Baylor, advance to Sweet 16
description: Ole Miss is headed back to the Sweet 16. In a back-and-forth affair, the No. 5-seeded Rebels won the final minute and knocked off No. 4 Baylor 69-63 in the second round of the NCAA Womenâ€™s Tournament on Sunday in Waco, Texas. With the victory, Ole Miss advances to the third round for the second time in the last three years. The game was tied 61-61 with 1:05 to go. Senior Madison Scott buried a ...
